VJsMag.com – Header Ad space 468×60 + Free Sidebar Ad Space 300×250 / 1 Month

$125.00 $75.00

VJs Magazine is a growing web mag about audio visual art forms, as a fresh company supporting the community of independent artists around the world and events that bring us together, we also want users to enjoy a unique user experience with quality articles and related ads. You’ll find bellow some of our statistics to give you an insight on where our users are browsing from, what technology they use, gender and age groups, how they browse and how many of them are returning visitors. If you would like to advertise with us we have several offers to choose from, please fill in the Advertisement Proposal and we will get back to you as soon as possible.

 


Ad Spaces






Category: Ad Spaces.
  • Shop
  • Reviews (0)

Product Description

Exceptional offer for two ad spaces with a monthly flat rate, meaning your ad will be over after 1 month with unlimited views and clicks on two different ad spaces giving you the best return, you better be quick for this one! To start a campaign please bid first, we will contact you directly in order to evaluate what is best for you. Please prepare your ad in jpg, gif or png formats with transparency in 300 pixels width by 250 pixels height and carefully state what you are promoting on your ad *.

VJs Mag Stats

In this product page contains on the image attachments an overview of the stats with: Demographic traffic, percentage of new visitors, percentage of referrals, percentage of male and female, age groups, bounce rate, average session duration, pages per session visitors browse, technologies visitors are using and main interests. If you’d like more detail on our general stats and global ranking, please visit our Advertising page or if you have any questions contact us directly on our Submit page***.

Estimated Traffic

  • Ad Clicks 250-300 per month ***.
  • Ad Views 3000-3500 per month ***.

*The products or services you may want to promote must be related to or must be closely related to audio visual technology and services, arts, design, films, music and events or nightlife.

**Purchase of an ad spaces on vjsmag.com does not guarantee your product or services will be selected to be posted on our social networks or newsletter, we do accept related items but reserve the right to publish the items or services under the current management team.

***Stats may vary each month, please check the date stats were published at the bottom of the Advertising page.
